name: Composition Number 10
description:
Composition Number 10 is the Team Quadratics entry for Ludum Dare 26. The theme for the competition was minimalism, so we chose to make a game based off of famous minimalist painter Piet Mondrian. There are several minigames you may encounter, and the instructions are given before the game. Otherwise, use arrow keys to move around. Enjoy!

Developers:
Programming - Adam V. (Wizered67), Ryan G. (Viper1044)
Graphics - Josh D. (Hoovyscoot), Paul K. (Pandadog123) , Ryan G. (Viper1044)
Audio - Kevin L. (Kayfon)
